title: Wario, Master of disguise

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Disguise as** (3x): Disguise a player's cause of death to a role of your choice if they die tonight.
- **Costume** (3x): Make a player reveal as another role if they die tonight.
- **Masquerade** (3x): Instantly give a copy of your first 2 attributes to a Koopa, it lasts for this night.
- **Mastery** (Day): Your abilities tonight will cost 2 ammo to use, but their effects become permanent, **Costume** will trigger if the target is hanged.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may appear to be a role of your choice to all investigative effects. You may change the role you appear as at any time.
- Your abilities are astral.
- The town is publicly notified that you spawned.
- You may multitask 2 abilities in one night, but only once, and you can't target the same players.
